casebody.data:
No. 09-11553. Lawton Tyson, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 562 U.S. 1055, 131 S. Ct. 628,

178 L. Ed. 2d 456,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9011. November 15, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 887, 131 S. Ct. 219, 178 L. Ed. 2d 132, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 7066.
